results.title: Selected Antihypertensive Agents and Their Fixed-Dose Combinations Effectively Ameliorate Trastuzumab-Mediated Cardiac Dysfunction In Rats.
results.text_hl: This study evaluates the therapeutic potentials of selected antihypertensive drugs [@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and their fixed-dose combinations (@CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) and (@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@)] in ameliorating @CHEMICAL_Trastuzumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068878 @@@trastuzumab@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Trastuzumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068878 @@@TZM@@@)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunctions@@@ in experimental @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Hemodynamic effects of lisinopril after long-term administration in congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: During initial evaluation, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ produced significant decreases in mean systemic arterial pressure, pulmonary artery wedge pressure, systemic vascular resistance, mean pulmonary arterial pressure, mean right atrial pressure and pulmonary vascular resistance, and concomitant increases in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac index@@@ and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke volume@@@ index.

citations.NLM: Stone CK, Uretsky BF, Linnemeier TJ, Shah PK, Amin DK, Snapinn SM, Rush JE, Langendörfer A, Liang CS. Hemodynamic effects of lisinopril after long-term administration in congestive heart failure. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Mar 1;63(9):567-70. PMID: 2537566

results.title: Early rather than delayed administration of lisinopril protects the heart after myocardial infarction in rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Both early and delayed treatments with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ increased survival.

results.title: Cardiac hypertrophy in experimental hypertension: interaction of the sodium ion, blood pressure and lisinopril.
results.text_hl: Significant @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac regression@@@ accompanied @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ receiving low @CHEMICAL_Salts @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012492 @@@salt@@@ diets but high @CHEMICAL_Salts @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012492 @@@salt@@@ intake severely attenuated regression in both strains.
